snippet.title: Portal Runner (Game Boy Color) Level 1
snippet.description:
This is a No Hit Hard Difficulty walk-through of Portal Runner for the Nintendo Game Boy Color. Played on the Nintendo Gamecube Game Boy Player.

Note: Your health, weapon count, and jewels carry on to the next level, but if you lose a life or use the password they reset to full health, 10 arrows, 5 fire arrows, and no jewels. 

3DO, Portal Runner, and logos are trademarks of The 3DO Company. All Rights Reserved. Copyright 2001. All other trademarks belong to their respective owners.
